title: K. Binding on All Users
intro: The provisions of this Privacy Policy shall apply not only to the primary registered individual of the organization but to every individual who has been granted access to the Sygence platform by the organization, whether directly or indirectly.
subtitle: This includes:
list: All employees or individuals on the organizationâ€™s payroll,
Any third parties who have been voluntarily given access to the platform by the organization, and
Any individual who has obtained access illegally or through circumvention of legal or technical processes.
footer: In the event that the initially registered individual ceases association with the organization, all other users, as defined above, shall continue to remain bound by the terms of this Privacy Policy. Sygence disclaims all liability for any breach or unauthorized use arising from such circumstances, and the responsibility to ensure authorized access and compliance remains solely with the registered organization.
